text: Neostenanthera robsonii is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Gabon. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Neostenanthera robsonii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Neostenanthera robsonii
